definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: strike, only = clap (the hand) (Aram. form of II. [[מָחָה]] q.v.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. only fig., of joy of inanimate things before ´[[י]]:[[נְהָרוֹת יִמְחֲאו־כָָף ]] Ps 98:8; [[וְכָל־עֲחֵי]]:[[הַשָּׂדֶה יִמְחֲאוּ־כָֽף ]] Is 55:12.—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. sf. id., of exultation over foe [[יַעַן מַחְאֲ ְיָד]] Ez Eze 25:6 (‖[[וְרַקְעֲךָ בְּרָָגֶל]]).
